channel.title: Doubled alc values
channel.description: ok i have been making some shops and for example d chain is 11m.... alcs for 22m because of the double alc value coding in ItemList and ItemHandler.... i tried removing these myself and really just messed everything up... i dont want my alc values to be double the shop value or else my economy would be all screwed so if anyone can help me this that would be great.....

item.title: Doubled alc values
item.dc:creator: @asilaydying asilaydying
item.description:
@asilaydying wrote:

yeah i know that much… ok i know that to get something to the price u wnat for example my d chain is 11m… i divided 11000000 by 1.26875 and put in the new decimal ofr all 3 of those #'s… the store buys for 11m, sells for 11m, but it alcs for 22m… i tried dividing the decimal by 2 for the alc price thinking it would alc for 11m but it changed shop values to 5.5m too…after a while i found out that the first 3 #'s are al shop related and that the actual alc price is set strictly by the “double highalc” void in itemlist and itemhandler, so i saught to remove these voids so that alcing wouldnt be doubled and it just fucked everything up -.- i just dont wanna for example sell d chain at general store for 11m and them be able to buy it and alc it for 22 -.-[br][size=1]Posted at: August 17, 2006, 11:36:20 PM[/size][hr]in a nutshell, i set the high alc low alc and shop sale prices to 11m, but it still alced for double the shop price when high alced, so i divided the # i put for high alc by 2 and it fucked everything up. i saw some double highalc voids in itemlist and itemhandler and i just wanan know what part of those voids i need to alter/remove to make the alc prie same as shop buy/sell price… i know this is confusing its hard to explain[br][size=1]Posted at: August 17, 2006, 11:38:41 PM[/size][hr]any 1?

Read full topic

item.title: Doubled alc values
item.dc:creator: @KiIIer KiIIer
item.description:
@KiIIer wrote:

im pretty sure this will help but before ur possitive make a back up file of items cgf. ok. go into items cgf then search Dragon_Chain and the first 3 numbers are the low alch high alch and shop sale price. change those to whatever u want. if this didnt help im sorry
